nutrition_information.6: For babies under 6 months (who are still breastfed): Breastmilk is all your baby needs.
nutrition_information.9: Always give your baby breastmilk first before giving other foods. You should feed your baby 3 times a day. Babies have small stomachs. Gradually increase the amount of food to half a cup per meal
nutrition_information.12: Always give your baby breastmilk first before giving other foods
nutrition_information.24: Foods that are thick enough to stay on the spoon give more energy to the child
